attributes.action: assist in the case of missing british toddler madeleine mccann
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to give whatever assistance necersary to make sure that little 4 year old british toddler madeleine mccann who went missing from her apartment in praia da luz portugal on may 3rd 07 whilst on holidays with her parents, to keep a full search for her and to keep her profile high priority here in the uk and the rest of europe untill she is found

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
